text: Bremgarten is a municipality in Aargau in Switzerland. On 1 January 2014 the former municipality of Hermetschwil-Staffeln merged into the municipality of Bremgarten. == References == == Other websites == * Verkehrsverein Bremgarten â€”the Tourist association in Bremgarten * Bremgarten - Official website Category:Cities in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Bremgarten
